title: UTOPIA
lyrics:
Nachseon deus igsughage
Neon naege millyeowa
Deo seonmyeonghi nal chaewoga
Ontong neoui saeg-eulo
Budeuleobge beonjyeowa

Neolo naneun byeonhaega

Nunbusin geu segyelo

Kkeullyeo deul-eoga



Oh naega neoui gyeot-eul jikilge

Sesang eodikkajilado

Oh ije neoleul wihae kkumkkulge

Hamkke i gil wileul geol-eo



Kkumcheoleom bulhyeondeus dagaon

Naui Utopia

Nae bichnaneun segyeya

Neoui sesang-e muldeul-eo



Hansungan naegelo ssod-ajin

Naui Utopia

Neol gadeughi dam-aga



Dulman-ui Utopia naega seolgyehae

Jonjae hanalodo banbogdwae

Jeolmanghan hyeonsil apahal ba-e

Aglalhan eodum-e majseolge nae Dystopialo



Mamsog han kyeon isang-eun da kkeut-eobs-i yeong-wonhagileul nan

Dallyeowa nal bangil ttae nan al-ass-eossji

You're my topia



Ttaseuhage gamssawa

Neolo naneun chaolla

Nunbusin i gil wilo

Naleul delyeoga



Oh neoui geu misoleul jikilge

Sesang eodikkajilado

Oh maeil nae kkum an-e iss-eo jwo

Hamkke i gil wileul geol-eo



Kkumcheoleom bulhyeondeus dagaon

Naui Utopia

Nae bichnaneun segyeya

Neoui sesang-e muldeul-eo



Hansungan naegelo ssod-ajin

Naui Utopia

Neol gadeughi dam-aga



Neoleul cheoeum mannan nal

Unmyeong sog-e hwibsseullyeo

Dansum-e nae gyeot-e dagaon

Naui Utopia

Nae modeun geol bakkwonwa



Han geol-eumssig neoui gyeot-e dagagalge

Neon naegen keun seonmul-iya

Heulishaessdeon modeun geos-i bunmyeonghaejyeo

Neon nae yuilhan bich-iya



Kkumcheoleom bulhyeondeus dagaon

Naui Utopia

Nae bichnaneun segyeya



Hansungan naegelo ssod-ajin

Naui Utopia

Neol gadeughi dam-aga



Oh yeogi nae mam-e neol saegilge

Jeoldae jiul su eobsdolog

Oh neoneun salajiji anhneun kkum

Hamkke i gil wileul geol-eo



Meomchun deus yeong-wonhan sigan sog

Naui Utopia

Neo hanaman umjig-yeo

Neoneun modeun geol neom-eoseo



Haecheoleom eodum-eul kkeutnaejun

Naui Utopia

Nal bichuneun bich-iya



Itolog chanlanhi bichnaneun

Naui Utopia

Nae yuilhan segyeya



Dalcheoleom eodum sog bichnaneun

Naui Utopia

Ojig hanaman bichna
